name: Death Butterfly Swarm
description: A large swarm of butterflies that inflict poison damage, capable of occupying another creature's space and moving through tight openings.
memorable: Its unique ability to inflict potent poison even on undead and its swarm tactics pose a significant threat.
goals: To hinder enemy movement and inflict poison damage.
relations: May swarm or appear alongside other insects or pests.
environment: Typically found in gardens, fields, or areas with abundant flora.
strengths: High mobility allows it to evade attacks and occupy spaces effectively in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold and fire damage, lacks sustained offensive capabilities outside its special abilities.
attacks: Perform a melee attack called Bites, dealing piercing damage and possible ongoing poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Potent Poison allows it to affect even resistant undead with its poison damage.
additional_information: Can occupy a creature's space and move freely through tight openings.
Immunities include charm, fright, paralysis, and poison.
A creature starting its turn in its space is at risk of being blinded.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
The swarm's speed reduction is a tactical advantage over opponents.
test_queries: nimble insect swarm that hinders movement
poisonous butterflies that can affect undead
dangerous insect swarm with potent poison
